All top-ups are made directly into the publisher's system, with a commitment not to use illegal goods that could affect the customer's account.

buyingGuide.title: How to Buy
buyingGuide.subtitle: âš¡ Quick Purchase Guide - Fast, secure, and 100% automated!
buyingGuide.step1Description: Go to the 'Deposit Account' section and choose your preferred automatic deposit method (Skrill, USDT, etc.). Make the transfer exactly as shown to ensure automatic detection.
buyingGuide.step2Description: After sending the payment, take a clear screenshot or photo of your transaction receipt and upload it through the 'Upload Receipt' section.
buyingGuide.step3Description: Our system will automatically verify your payment. Once confirmed, your balance will be updated instantly.
buyingGuide.step4Description: Browse the store and select the account you wish to buy. Click 'Buy Now' â€“ the system will deduct the amount directly from your balance.
buyingGuide.step5Description: After a successful purchase, your account details will appear immediately on the screen and also be sent to your email. You can log in and start playing right away!
buyingGuide.footer: Fast, secure, and 100% automated â€” start now and get your account within seconds!
buyingGuide.note: ðŸ’¡ Always double-check your payment details before uploading your receipt.
